trans-unit.source: Provides facilities for managing input languages in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 提供用於管理中的輸入的語言的設備[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Additional languages can be registered by using the Regional and Language Options control panel.
trans-unit.target: 使用 [地區及語言選項] 控制台中，可以註冊其他語言。

trans-unit.source: From the Languages tab, select "Text Services and input languages", then click the "Details" button to register additional languages.
trans-unit.target: 從 [語言] 索引標籤中，選取"文字服務和輸入的語言 」，然後按一下 [詳細資料] 按鈕，以登錄其他語言。

trans-unit.source: The following dialog appears.
trans-unit.target: 下列對話方塊隨即出現。

trans-unit.source: ![Text services and input languages dialog.](~/add/media/tsf-dialog.PNG "Text services and input languages dialog.")
trans-unit.target: ![文字服務和輸入語言對話方塊。](~/add/media/tsf-dialog.PNG "文字服務和輸入語言對話方塊。")

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator for currently available input languages.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前可用的輸入語言的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: An enumerator for currently available input languages, or **null** if no input languages are available.
trans-unit.target: 列舉程式目前可用的輸入語言，或**null**如果沒有輸入的語言可用。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性就沒有預設值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the input language manager associated with the current context.
trans-unit.target: 取得與目前內容相關聯的輸入的語言管理員。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager"></xref> object associated with the current context.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager"> </xref>與目前內容相關聯的物件。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性就沒有預設值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current input language.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前的輸入的語言。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object representing the currently selected input language.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件，代表目前選取的輸入的語言。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: This property may not be set to **null**.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不可以設**null**。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture*>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture*>.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture*>

trans-unit.source: Raised when an attempt is made to set this property to **null**.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試將此屬性設定為時引發**null**。

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguage*> attached property for a specified dependency object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的值<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguage*>附加指定的相依性物件的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguage*>

trans-unit.source: The dependency object for which to retrieve the input language.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取輸入的語言相依性物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object representing the input language for the specified dependency object.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件，代表指定相依性物件的輸入的語言。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: Raised when target is **null**.
trans-unit.target: Raised when target is **null**.

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage*> attached property for a specified dependency object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的值<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage*>附加指定的相依性物件的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage*>

trans-unit.source: The dependency object for which to retrieve the value of <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage*>.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取的<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage*>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage*>值的相依性物件

trans-unit.source: The current value of <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage*> for the specified dependency object.
trans-unit.target: 目前的值<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage*>所指定相依性物件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage*>

trans-unit.source: Raised when target is **null**.
trans-unit.target: Raised when target is **null**.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a change of input language is completed.
trans-unit.target: 在完成輸入語言變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a change of input language is initiated.
trans-unit.target: 起始輸入語言變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguage*> attached property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguage*>附加屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguage*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Registers an input language source with the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 暫存器的輸入的語言來源<xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies the input language to register.
trans-unit.target: 物件，指定要登錄的輸入的語言。

trans-unit.source: This object must implement the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.IInputLanguageSource"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: 這個物件必須實作<xref href="System.Windows.Input.IInputLanguageSource"></xref>介面。

trans-unit.source: Raised when inputLanguageSource is **null**.
trans-unit.target: Raised when inputLanguageSource is **null**.

trans-unit.source: Report the completion of a change of input language to the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 報表完成時的輸入語言變更<xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object representing the new input language.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件，代表新的輸入的語言。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object representing the previous input language.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件，表示先前的輸入的語言。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: Raised when newLanguageId or previousLanguageId is **null**.
trans-unit.target: Raised when newLanguageId or previousLanguageId is **null**.

trans-unit.source: Report the initiation of a change of input language to the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 報告的輸入語言變更啟始<xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object representing the new input language.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件，代表新的輸入的語言。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object representing the previous input language.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件，表示先前的輸入的語言。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: **true** to indicate that the reported change of input language was accepted; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **true**表示報告的變更的輸入語言的已接受，否則**false**。

trans-unit.source: Raised when newLanguageId or previousLanguageId is **null**.
trans-unit.target: Raised when newLanguageId or previousLanguageId is **null**.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage*> attached property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage*>附加屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguage*> attached property on the specified dependency object.
trans-unit.target: 設定的值<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguage*>附加屬性所指定相依性物件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguage*>

trans-unit.source: The dependency object on which to set the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguage*> attached property.
trans-unit.target: 這是要設定的相依性物件<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguage*>附加屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguage*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object representing the new value for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguage*> attached property.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件，代表新值<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguage*>附加屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguage*> </xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: Raised when target is **null**.
trans-unit.target: Raised when target is **null**.

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage*> dependency property on the specified dependency object.
trans-unit.target: 設定的值<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage*>所指定相依性物件的相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage*>

trans-unit.source: The dependency object for which to set the value of <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage*>.
trans-unit.target: 要設定的<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage*>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage*>值的相依性物件

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value to set the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage*> attached property to.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定的布林值<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage*>附加屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RestoreInputLanguage*>

trans-unit.source: Raised when target is **null**.
trans-unit.target: Raised when target is **null**.
